oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WAVE KINEMATICS IN THE SURFACE ZONE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Skjelbreia, James E.
Torun, Alf
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: surface zone
wave kinematics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An extensive series of laboratory experiments have been carried out with regular and irregular waves travelling over a horizontal bottom. Velocity measurements of the flow were obtained at numerous vertical positions with major emphasis given to the surface zone. The flow measurements were made possible by use of a custom designed LDV having the special characteristic of being operative very near the free surface. Presented is an overview of the study and some of its majors results.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 22 (1990): Proceedings of 22nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Delft, The Netherlands, 1990.
